replies.txt_content:
forge mod loader has found problem with your minecraft installation
the mods and versions listed below could not be found
immbiscore:any
the file forgemodloader-client-0.log contains more information
把让你崩溃的mod从mods文件夹删除

replies.author: yzx725
replies.txt_content: 你出错前安装进去什么mod，就把什么mod删除，实在不行就一个一个地删。或者装modloader，要看是什么版本，如果装了就如上。这是mod冲突问题。
